entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
